name: Entaku no Seito (DRPG Selection)
summary:
It is a Xbox 360 re-release of the ported game "Entaku no Seito". The game was only released in Japan. 
 
The game is a dungeon crawling JRPG with some unique mechanics. It has a bonding system, a the ability to lure enemies into traps and a rivalry system used to fight over treasure. 
 
The re-release was the only game included in the Dungeon Role-Playing Game (DRPG) Selection Label for the Xbox 360. The idea was to increase the genres customer base by offering games at a lower price point.

alternative_names.name: Entaku no Seito: Students of Round (DRPG Selection)
